body_html: Can you check the output of which ipython3 to see if it is running the version inside your virtualenv? You may need to install it inside your virtualenv (e.g. using pip install) to get it to work.
body_text: Can you check the output of which ipython3 to see if it is running the version inside your virtualenv? You may need to install it inside your virtualenv (e.g. using pip install) to get it to work.
body: Can you check the output of `which ipython3` to see if it is running the version inside your virtualenv? You may need to install it inside your virtualenv (e.g. using `pip install`) to get it to work.
